messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/4/2005 6:08:30 PM Mountain Standard Time, we3deeves@aol.com writes: the big  problem with math is that it is cumulative and must be
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/4/2005 6:08:30 PM Mountain Standard Time,
we3deeves@... writes:

the big problem with math is that it is cumulative and
must be learned from start to finish.


=----=============

I wouldn't even try to deal with someone who is THAT far from understanding
how learning works. Honestly.

Here are some articles you might just link out there for people to take or
leave, though.

_http://sandradodd.com/math_ (http://sandradodd.com/math)

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
